description: Retrieves a paginated list of deployment jobs that IoT Greengrass sends to Greengrass core devices.

parameters.name: coreDeviceThingName
parameters.description: The name of the core device. This is also the name of the IoT thing.

nested_items.name: effectiveDeployments
nested_items.description: A list that summarizes each deployment on the core device.

nested_items.name: deploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the deployment.

nested_items.name: deploymentName
nested_items.description: The name of the deployment.

nested_items.name: iotJobId
nested_items.description: The ID of the IoT job that applies the deployment to target devices.

nested_items.name: iotJobArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IoT job that applies the deployment to target devices.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the deployment job.

nested_items.name: targetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the target IoT thing or thing group.

nested_items.name: coreDeviceExecutionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the deployment job on the Greengrass core device.
IN_PROGRESS --- The deployment job is running.
QUEUED --- The deployment job is in the job queue and waiting to run.
FAILED --- The deployment failed. For more information, see the statusDetails field.
COMPLETED --- The deployment to an IoT thing was completed successfully.
TIMED_OUT --- The deployment didn't complete in the allotted time.
CANCELED --- The deployment was canceled by the user.
REJECTED --- The deployment was rejected. For more information, see the statusDetails field.
SUCCEEDED --- The deployment to an IoT thing group was completed successfully.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: The reason code for the update, if the job was updated.

nested_items.name: creationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the deployment was created, expressed in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: modifiedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the deployment job was last modified, expressed in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: statusDetails
nested_items.description: The status details that explain why a deployment has an error. This response will be null if the deployment is in a success state.

nested_items.name: errorStack
nested_items.description: Contains an ordered list of short error codes that range from the most generic error to the most specific one. The error codes describe the reason for failure whenever the coreDeviceExecutionStatus is in a failed state. The response will be an empty list if there is no error.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: errorTypes
nested_items.description: Contains tags which describe the error. You can use the error types to classify errors to assist with remediating the failure. The response will be an empty list if there is no error.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
